title: Cajeta Sundae Recipe
full_text:
Cajeta Sundae Recipe
Close
Jump to recipe
Prep
5 mins
Active
10 mins
Total
5 mins
Serves
4
to 6 servings
Cook Mode
(Keep screen awake)
Ingredients
1
recipe
Cajeta Ice Cream
1
recipe
Cajeta Casera
, warmed (see note)
1
recipe
Cajeta Whipped Cream
1
ounce
salted popcorn
(
1
cup
;
30
g
) or other crunchy topping
Directions
Before starting, freeze parfait glasses until frosty. Divide ice cream into as many portions as you prefer, dunking the ice cream scoop in hot water from time to time to ensure a clean release. Drizzle each with a few tablespoons of warm cajeta, then top with a generous dollop of Cajeta Whipped Cream. Sprinkle with salted popcorn or other topping and serve immediately.
Special Equipment
Parfait dishes, ice cream scoop
Notes
The ice cream and cajeta sauce can be prepared up to a month in advance, while the cajeta whipped cream will keep for a week in the fridge. Leftover cajeta can be saved for saucing other desserts, or used as a filling for
alfajores
.
